Traits.Name: Antimagic Susceptibility
Traits.Content: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the armor must succeed on a Not for resale. Permission granted to print or photocopy this document for personal use only. System Reference Document 5.1 264Constitution saving throw against the casterâ€™s spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

Traits.Name: False Appearance
Traits.Content: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The armor makes two melee attacks.

Actions.Name: Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
